00067 class ZIP_API CHmac
00068 {
00069 public:
00070  CHmac();
00071  CHmac(const CHmac& hmac)
00072  {
00073   *this = hmac;
00074  }
00075  CHmac& operator = (const CHmac& hmac)
00076  {
00077   memcpy(m_key, hmac.m_key, ZIP_SHA1_BLOCK_SIZE);
00078   m_uKeyLength = hmac.m_uKeyLength;
00079   m_sha1 = hmac.m_sha1;
00080   return *this;
00081  }
00094  bool SHA1Key(const char* pKey, UINT uKeyLength);
00095 
00106  void Data(const char* pData, UINT uSize);
00107 
00117  void End(char* pData, UINT uSize);
00118  ~CHmac();
00119 protected:
00120  char m_key[ZIP_SHA1_BLOCK_SIZE];
00121  UINT m_uKeyLength;
00122     CSha1 m_sha1;
